@ShireenJ it has been a very odd year. â˜ƒ

@Stv this is still a bit of a pain in the ass. Wood glue takes a long time to dry and it needs to be done in stages. Q is not so patient.
@AnthonyFloyd he was told he was getting a haircut, but that he could choose to have more bangs if he wanted.
Making of the Trebuchet. Lots of gluing and trying to keep the glued bits together withoutâ€¦ https://t.co/S36qBJgbUd
More barbering. Q always looks so serious when he gets his hair cut. He is also starting to takeâ€¦ https://t.co/tAO8nsIUJF
Another visit to the barber. It always amazes me how much older he looks afterward. #stillaboy https://t.co/QkpyxLnedJ
@mystrangebones I am glad that people are not being complacent. I'm getting my boys to write to our MPs to get Canada to make a bigger fuss.
@mystrangebones I really wish that we could change things for you. I am so upset, I can only imagine how you feel.
A little time outside and some races along the sidewalks make for happy brothers. #brothers #play https://t.co/sXUN2ugx1f
I am looking forward to having under bed boxes for their sheets and blankets. Aidan is nostalgic for the only bed he remembers.
Getting ready to change the boys small bunk beds to higher ones = a whole trunk full of toys & clothes for donation. Total room purge.
@harrietglynn I hope both the tax woes and binding headache go away soon.
Always good to see people you know at a protest march. I like knowing that Aidan and Q's teachers are politically active too.

It was pouring this morning but the playground was finally open for business. I should haveâ€¦ https://t.co/BSV7pjVaaD
I hate that this migraine is not letting me sleep. Even getting the pain under control, I am still not sleeping. Sigh.
@ShireenJ I think I'll keep my measles damaged eye and stay away from brain injury if I can possibly help it. How is it going with the eye?
@mylovablelabels maybe this was meant as a dm?
@Apartment_Mama not today, but frequently.
@harrietglynn treacherous. Darn spelling.
@scatteredmom @harrietglynn they don't clear any side streets here. They should clear at least the school streets, but they won't.
@harrietglynn besides if they can't clear the side streets I don't know what we can expect. It is treaterous walking to school.
@harrietglynn the city & VSB think the other is responsible for clearing the sidewalk around schools. VSB gets its janitors to clear grounds
@Stv @AnthonyFloyd so dangerous. If the city had cleared even the middle of all the streets we would be fine. So irresponsible.
@AnthonyFloyd the school itself had some of the new paths cleared, the ramps anyway.
@AnthonyFloyd at least some of the apartments around the school are trying to melt some of the sidewalks.
@AnthonyFloyd it is a fucking nightmare around the school. No side walks cleared, all ice. The side streets around the schools ice rinks.
@harrietglynn they didn't clear when schools were in either. So effing frustrating.
@AnthonyFloyd I had a hard time listening to him bluster that they were putting out more people. Just say you screwed up!
Happy new year everyone.
I've given in to the headache caused by tiredness & am calling it a night. The 8 & 11yolds are holding on by sheer force of will. #nye2016

@maryotto they should learn from the crap the bc gov't put our teachers through. Supreme Court ruling in the teachers favour.
@maryotto it is unbelievable. Our kids went through 2 work to rule situations and I never once feared for their safety.
I don't believe that teachers working to rule in NS is putting students' safety at risk. I'm flabbergasted that NS gov't is closing schools.
